name: Envelope (AR/AD)
description: This algorithm generates simple attack/release or attack/decay envelopes. It is based on the disting mk4 algorithm “E-1 AR Envelope”. In the disting mk4 version the envelope times were always set together from a single knob; this version adds the option of setting them independently. The envelope times and shapes are set globally; each output channel can however be independently scaled and offset. In “Attack/release” mode, the envelope will rise to full level and stay there as long as the input is high. In “Attack/decay” mode, the envelope will execute one full attack/decay cycle in response to a trigger input. In “Looped AD” mode, the envelope will continually execute attack/decay cycles as long as the trigger input is high. In “Macro (asymmetric)” mode, the “Joint time” parameter sweeps from short A & D, through short A & long D, through long A & D, through long A & short D, and finally back to short A & D. In “Macro (symmetric)” mode, the “Joint time” parameter sets the A & D times to the same value, from very short times (about 10ms) to very long times (about 8s). Note that the actual times are heavily dependent on the shape parameters.

mode

The trigger mode. The options are:
●
Attack/release

Attack/decay

Looped AD

parameters.name: Time mode
parameters.description:
The envelope time mode. The options are:
●
Macro (asymmetric)
●
Macro (symmetric)
●
Independent

parameters.name: Joint time
parameters.description: Sets the attack and release times if the ‘Time mode’ is one of the two ‘Macro’ options.

parameters.description:
Sets the attack time if the ‘Time mode’ is
‘Independent'

parameters.name:
Attack
shape
parameters.description:
Sets the attack shape, from an
exaggerated exponential curve at 0 to an almost linear shape at 128.

parameters.name:
Release
shape
parameters.description:
Sets the release shape, from an

Output
mode

parameters.name: Amplitude
parameters.description: Sets the amplitude of the envelope. Note that negative values give an inverted envelope.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Sets a constant voltage offset for the envelope.
